document.full_text: growth slowed in some u.s. regions during may as costlier food and energy as well as supply disruptions stemming from a major earthquake in japan in march took a toll, the federal reserve said on wednesday.
document.title: growth slowed in spring but didn't stall: fed
lines_and_colors: growth slowed in some u.s. regions during may as costlier food and energy as well as supply disruptions stemming from a major earthquake in japan in march took a toll, the federal reserve said on wednesday.
